root.text: Visual Analytics is a body of knowledge that allows us to use techniques with interactive visualization algorithms and methods of data analysis in order to support the analytical reasoning for decision making.

text: This workshop introduces visual analytics and data visualization and also provides Hands-On experience with help of Tableau.
It helps students to design principles for creating meaningful display of qualitative and quantitative data to facilitate effective information generation and result analysis.
This workshop also focuses on developing an understanding of fundamentals of communication and alignment around concepts that are required for effective data representation.
8:45 AM - 9:00 AM - Students should assemble at Multimedia Lab.
9:00 AM - 10:00 AM - Introduction to art and science of data visualization.
10:00 AM - 10:30 AM - Creating a good data set for analysis.
10:45 AM - 1:00 PM - Introduction to Tableau.
1:00 PM - 1:30 PM - Lunch.
1:30 PM - 2:30 PM - Story telling with data (Team Work).
2:30 PM - 3:30 PM - Generating info-graphics and other visualization.
3:00 PM - 3:45 PM - Break.
3:45 PM – 4:30 PM - Final Visual representation.
**The above mentioned schedule can be changed based on availability of time**
“First come First serve”.
In case of on spot registration (subjected to availability), the students are requested to bring the exact sum of the mentioned amount for general registration along with the respective workshop fee.
Participants are requested to carry the hard copy of the workshop confirmation receipt.
Participants must have a valid ID card of their respective educational institutions.
Participants have to register individually.

root.text: Under any circumstances, the fee will not be refunded.

INR 750/ student for registering the workshop.

Fees Includes

text: Hands-On training with Tableau.
Supportive Course Materials.
Real World dataset for Analysis.

Fee is exclusive of food and accommodation.

In addition to the workshop fee there will be a mandatory KRIYA registration fee of,
Rs.150 for PSG Tech Students
Rs.250 for other College Students.
